pkgmetadata.longdescription: Small Area Estimation with Cluster Information for Estimation of Non-Sampled Areas // Implementation of small area estimation (Fay-Herriot model) with EBLUP (Empirical Best Linear Unbiased Prediction) Approach for non-sampled area estimation by adding cluster information and assuming that there are similarities among particular areas. See also Rao Molina (2015, ISBN:978-1-118-73578-7) and Anisa et al. (2013) doi:10.9790/5728-10121519.
